front.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Rf Protection of Personnel Working in the Vicinity of Wireless Communications Antennas Attached to Electric Power Line Structures

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This Guide presents information on establishing an effective safety program to assure compliance with the applicable regulations for radio frequency (RF) protection of electrical workers in the vicinity of wireless communication antennas adjacent or attached to electrical power line structures. The Guide also provides information on power frequency electric and magnetic field immunity of RF personal monitors and RF protective clothing.
